p3U5s7EVdLqhY-MHsntiEw.text: This place sucks! I called and I couldn't understand anything they said! They also were going to charge me 31 bucks for 2 medium pizzas which is insane. If they are going to work there they need to know what the heck they are doing. I called back to cancel my order and they got shitty with me. Never calling or ordering from them again! They were AWFUL!! They also told me I couldn't get a medium pan pizza. Their service was just terrible. They had no idea what they were doing.

fGEHicXS3mEq1y4JEuaLiw.text: Really... really really horrible. Like awful. We ordered two cheeseless pizzas (that should make it... more simple, right? IDK) and were told that it would be 25 to 35 minutes for delivery. We waited a literal hour, called up, were told that the delivery driver was on his way... it's over a half hour later, still no pizza. I'm really frustrated (and hungry?) and irritated. We ordered at 1:29. At the time of this review it is 3:13. Really unacceptable. Won't be ordering again from this location.

3FqMBts9mkMLLy1NYSKW1Q.text: Horrible service. Called at 11:30am. I live less than a mile away. I called after am hour and they said it was out for delivery. Nope! Then the guy calls me 20 minutes later bc he can't find the address. I told him to forget it. Not worth the bad pizza. And they obviously deliver but you cannot order online for delivery which I do not understand. I wish I could give them no stars. Like other reviewers stated, they were bad and I thought after a year I would give them another chance. So really I guess this is my mistake. Will not order from here ever again. Horrible.

TGV9gQKxWAgDqLtcvYbcFw.text: Very rude staff. The pizza was good but the staff will deter you from ordering from there again.

xvz78poYY1O8g7tqhMYaYQ.text: Horrible service would not recommend to anyone always cold and two hours late I will never be ordering again and thinking of complaining to corporate.

J_BBd5xiFZvC0Mej02Y3rQ.text: Let me start out by saying all items made it on delivery. We ordered two medium pepperoni pizzas with bread sticks and cinnamon sticks and 2 ltr coke. Everything was fine until we opened the pizza. The smell of rancid pepperoni filled the air. We couldn't believe it. So I called the store to inform them that I didn't want a refund and that they may be serving rancid pepperoni. The person answered and became very ignorant and rude when I politely claimed there was a problem. After showing his ignorance and stating that the only reason for my complaint is because he's not American, I could see there was no point to proceed further. They burned me for 25.75 + 5.25 tip. I'm not one to complain if I have a serious complaint I just don't return. But this one I will be forwarding to corporate for further review. No franchisee should have people who work for them like these guys. Wazeen is the mgr and was supposedly not around when I called. No certified food safety mgr on duty! No wonder ACHD Wants letter grades for restaurants.

sigKLw3C1BjjRhnzgyoc9w.text: Let me start by saying, if I could give them 0 stars, I would. 1 star is being generous. This is the second time we've had issues with this store and after the time, we stopped ordering for a while but then after about 8 months decided to give them another try. What a mistake. WHAT. A. MISTAKE. they forgot our soda (which happened to be the root of the problem the last time as well), we were told they'd be back with it in an hour. Now, that right there is absurd to me... An hour?! I ordered the soda to go WITH my pizza.. I mean, really?? OK, so an hour comes an goes, we call back and are told that the delivery driver just came and got it and it on his way. A half hour later.. You guessed it, still no soda (we live a mile away, FYI). So we call yet again. The 'shift leader' answers and wants to know who told us he was on his way.. Well, as much as I like to make it a habit to learn all the names of the employees of surrounding businesses, we didn't know who this person was. So let's skip to the real reason for this review. Although there are LOTS of things I could write about and truthfully, probably should, what prompted me to write this review was that the lady on the other end of the phone dropped the F bomb at my husband. And not just once or twice, no no, about 6 times. Was he heated? Yes. I'm not saying he was a doll about the whole thing. But she started swearing and threatening to call the cops on him because he said he was going to just come get it himself. Seriously. Just never ever again. Never. Ever. All we wanted was a soda!

_LesyHR6pMFcrtPAkCgn5g.text: Terrible. I ordered and paid for 3 hoagies online and after over an hour and a half, 3 calls to the store, and three calls plus many voice mails with the driver, I had to cancel my order. I went to subway for dinner.When I finally got in contact with the owner another hour and a half later, he said he can send out a large pizza for free. I can't get something I paid for and then had to go somewhere else to eat, how exactly did he think I would now want a pizza. After i said this, he said that if I keep his phone number I can call another time and get the pizza. I do not believe I will get a pizza, at least not one that is spit free.

-m0fUqykTLhaRzPrvHydzg.text: I don't care how hungry you are or if you have absolutely no food in the house or if literally nothing else is open--do NOT even both with this store. I have tried to order from this Domino's location on several occasions and, both times, it has been disastrous on a ridiculous level. I currently have Waseem yelling at my boyfriend on the phone for being "a bad customer" for wanting to cancel our order after placing it at 1:15 and waiting for it to even leave the store for over an hour. You are literally better off just sleeping off your hunger or chewing on your window pane painted with lead paint honestly. Literally do not bother--save yourself the aggregation.

QrQrsWSIFCm2Ze47do8i1w.text: Ordered a pizza. Was told 45 minute delivery time. After an hour and a half I called to cancel order. Driver shows up two hours later attempting to deliver pizza. We had already eaten somewhere else. Charged my credit card anyway. Horrible.

a3RnBTbGSJiR0ttEvqozfw.text: THE WORST CUSTOMERS SERVICE I HAVE EVER RECEIVED. Pizza was 1.5 hours late! Then...IT WAS THE WRONG PIZZA! When I called to ask for a refund, every person who answered said I needed to call back in an hour when a manager would be there. After 4 phone calls and 30 minutes of waiting to speak to someone, I finally reached the manager by chance. I explained I wanted a refund due to the pizza arriving 1.5 hours late and wasn't even what I ordered or liked so it wasn't even edible...his response..."I can't give you a refund, but I will give you a free pizza." Hey dummy...I don't want a pizza from you guys EVER again! I just want my freaking money back for your terrible service and incorrect product.  He wouldn't give me a refund so I had to block the charge through my credit card company.  This Dominos location knows nothing about how to make an order or what good customer service is.  Save your money or spend it somewhere else. TRUST ME.

bBtpw0LshFoA7DOApDQZvg.text: Ordered diet coke, got coke.  Driver told me they didn't have diet coke.  When I said, why did I leave my number, he said sorry.  Pizza was decent

4X-2rCJ3k7y9rJzF4JgmgA.text: It took 1 hour and 35 minutes for them to deliver us 2 pizzas about 12 minutes away. The employees were very rude. Of course the pizza was cold by the time we got it. Terrible service!

V6Y0rDpHxHcQOG0nQ54XNg.text: To take the words from a previous reviewer, if I was able to give this place 0 stars, I would in a heartbeat. About a month ago, we ordered pizza from here. (The two guys I work with and me) An hour came and went, and still no pizza. We called the store and were told that the driver was on his way. So, another hour came and went. (2 hours now since the order was placed) We called again and the lady informed us that the driver had been "held up" and robbed. Seriously...? I don't mean to sound crass, but I don't believe that for a second. At this point, we requested to have our money back only to then be yelled at and sworn at by the lady on the other end. She finally complied, but only after she threatened to call the police on us. (Sounds kind of familiar...) Now to today. I ordered my pizza at 11:48AM. (The store is 7 minutes from where we work FYI) 12:30 came, still no pizza, so we called. I was told the driver is on his way. 12:45...Nothing. 1:00...Nothing. I called again and was informed that he was going to call the driver to see what was going on. Around 1:10PM (Almost an hour and a half), the pizza showed up. The driver also had someone in the car with him and did not even come to the door. This place is clearly very improperly run and just all around horrific customer service. I would HIGHLY recommend that you do not place an order from here unless you plan on driving to get it yourself.

WXT4UArCCwRiQ8zoXt9pqw.text: I have never had so much trouble with a restraunt/fastfood as i did with this Domino's.First, The driver waited for me to come outside and waved me to his car instead of bring the pizza to the door.Then they overcharged my card because the driver wrote his  own tip that i did not sign for. After 2 weeks of trying to get in touch with their owner office, i finally gave up and just took the $7 credit they offered me (even though cooperate said it was supposed to be a refund) and when i called in to use it the worker that answered had a bad attitude about it. I am NEVER using Domino's again

fAag6iN0FLVwe1xXNLFfdA.text: Didn't answer the phone when I called so I placed the order online. They took 30 mins to even put the stuff in the oven. When delivered, the driver made me come outside in the cold to his car. Waiving me out his window to come to his car after he pulled up. Claiming the hotel wouldn't let him in, I said ok, just hurry up and let me sign my receipt. I regret tipping him. Also the worst prepared pasta bread bowls I've ever got from Dominos. Try a different location. This one sucked.

rZSgcNzfRMDz4syd7q4V4A.text: I order from there all the time. I love their pizza and i tip them all the time. So, it baffles me that tonight when I was suffering from laryngitis, I ordered free pizza and a Coke to help my aching trachea.it was prescribed by my doctor. Then the guy, high beam didn't my coke and throat started hurting worst. It made me not ever want to place a order for delivery again. :( what am I gonna do about my aching throat without my throat ?! Grrr

SRoqtWek4J8OUFAhn8bTLQ.text: I don't expect much of a Domino's Pizza, but the service at this location is outstandingly poor. I'm not sure if they're just lying on the Domino's tracker or what, but they regularly mark my pizza as "ready" before it is, and "picked up" while I'm still sitting in the store waiting for double the estimated cook time. If it takes a long time that's fine, but don't mark it as ready and I won't leave my home just yet! The one time it was actually ready on time they forgot the toppings, so I have yet to have an acceptable experience. 3 strikes you're out.

mH9qdcYuJbApYK2Mdl5wkg.text: We ordered a pizza at 3:44, got the pizza at 4:43, it was ice cold with hair in it. We called the restaurant and they told us there was no way it was cold, they got so disrespectful that we had to talk to the manager, we were told we would get a refund and another pizza. We never got the refund or the pizza. This isn't the first time it has happened either, never ordering again.

PAFCKZ5q_wECdwEtqWbzPQ.text: Wish u could give 0 stars. Customer service sucks, delivery takes over an hour even tho I like literally 6 minutes at most so yeah it sucks too. And the pizza is worse than both of the previous mentions. I'd actually pay money to starve before I order from this place. AND THEY DON'T WEAR GLOVES!!!

yYZ1IEpngKLESy6t3FH-TQ.text: Worst service I have ever received.  Got the wrong order and instead of expediting the correct item, the manager had informed us we would have to wait over 2 hours for replacement.  Never have gone back to ordering from this place!

cyyDfUiOFWwtiCzUMhjfQA.text: I've never had issues with this place, clean store front, easy ordering, and the carry out deal is awesome!

O51CHtxHb2LGRB_bwq0s8g.text: Completely disrespectful on the phone. Ordered pizza and bread twists @10:09pm.l a simple order kind you. And the pizza was not delivered until 11:45. I called to complain and was immediately greeted with hostility before I was hung up on. Completely unprofessional and I will not order from here again.

LlSROjoGe6UQeC-eN-cr5w.text: I hate giving bad reviews, but I'm done with this dominos. They take forever to deliver and the pizza is usually over cooked or the order is messed up. Don't waste your time and money on this place.

nllFNT5DjRXT0sJwUV0Vyg.text: Ordered a 3 topping pizza and an Italian sandwich (?). I had ordered an Italian hoagie but that's not what I got. I got this thing that was more like a calzone. The sandwich wasn't too bad but the pizza was the worst I have ever had.  What was ordered was a large pizza with sausage,bacon and pepper. What I got was a cold cheese pizza that was cold and soggy with the toppings warmed up and thrown on top of the cold cheese pizza. The pizza was so soggy that it bent when you tried to lift it and all the toppings fell off and into the box. I plan on making a complaint to the health department for foods not kept at the right temps.

TLBvF90n0GliFoDDVyC2Ng.text: Terrible service. I've now been waiting just about 2 hours for delivery. When I called an hour and 15 minutes into waiting he told me my driver had left. When I called back about 40 minutes later he told me the driver has been on the road and should've been here by now. About 5 minutes after that the driver calls me and tells me he is on the way. About 10 minutes after that the app was updated and told me the driver had left... I don't appreciate being lied to. I understand I might not be the closest delivery but this is outrageous. The phone call was ended early by whoever answers phones, in other words, he hung up on me. I have ordered a few times and never had an issue other than delivery time. I will not give them another dollar. Not only that. If you treat your customers like absolute sh*t you don't deserve to have any customers at all.  I'm also still waiting for my food

SDDy-Q5O1VAXuMKNMEl46w.text: I've never had a problem with this Dominos. Delivery was on time even when it was at almost 1 AM! They cook their pizza so yummy too. It's so good, that all of a sudden my family members who have always said "Dominos is disgusting!" started stealing my leftover pizza without asking. Wish I had a mini fridge in my room!

zBFewZeko-efMD_jP613bw.text: I ordered a sandwich with no blue cheese, but they gave it to me.  My wife is HIGHLY allergic to blue cheese, and broke out in hives after touching it to inspect the sandwich.  After calling the store the man on the phone lied and said the sandwich doesn't come with blue cheese, I printed the description on the website and he said that it does come with blue cheese, but they never put it on any of their sandwiches unless a customer asks for it.  Once I arrived at the store to return the item and express my displeasure, one of the employees whom I hadn't spoken to on the phone reinforced the explanation that they never put blue cheese on sandwiches and I must be looking at ranch, which is absolutely not part of the order description and hadn't been requested.  I wasn't offered anything for compensation, any apology, nothing.  They just refunded me for the sandwich.  This is absolutely disgraceful customer service, and quite frankly, I don't much appreciate this "new" face to Domino's.

ZPykNWLAcY9U0Dqs4oUz3A.text: Service is terrible. I ordered on the app but then called to confirm my sauces. Ordered 1 steak hoagie & 1 Italian hoagie. When I called to make sure they would send mayo & Italian dressing with the sandwiches I was put on hold, transferred, and called back just for them to tell me they would charge for Italian dressing because it didn't come on the hoagie & the didn't have mayo. So much for that order. Cancelled. Don't order here. Shane because there's not much to eat in this area.

0M83Z1lZwdBFdnNRooQKsw.text: I never had issues with them. Always the delivery was done on time. The staff is very friendly neat and clean. One of my fav stores near my place.

OKUyxXKdxUCdt_ZijevVDg.text: Ordered 2 medium pizzas using the Dominos app at 6:20 tonight. It is now 7:40 and I just got a call that the delivery driver will be here in a few minutes. This is the second order I have had with this restaurant that has taken over an hour. Never again.

5ZmHEdcCcWX4gPY4LbumJg.text: This pizza is cardboard. The cheese sucks and after 10 minutes sitting its already hard as a rock. Never eating here again.

nLnexJXaK-VArBhRyxTmjA.text: An absolute shit hole. Literally ordered an hour before close and was told that their drivers were all out so it would be abt an hour which was fine. Then they said we had to order online  and then I inquired why and suddenly they couldn't order to our home which could be in walking distance basically so we did so. And the pizza was absolute shit.  In no way would I ever order from here again. So disgusting and such terrible service.

otd06GQnLyQVmUTy9PY7nQ.text: If you are ordering from Domino's then you are hankering for that special, simple taste of frozen pizza assembled quickly by teenagers. No fuss, no muss. Not a bad time and never a great time. It is Domino's. End of story.

ZM8F1oI_NNf0c9XbP9Hs6A.text: So this review is about Domino's customer service in genefal. I ordered a pizza from the foster ave domino's a little over a month ago . Now it isn't a huge deal but they forgot to put one of the toppings on the pizza. Hey, I paid for the 3rd topping so I wax a little annoyed. Yes it was the workers at this dominos who forgot, but I'll give them props that customer service was good when I came to get the pizza, the young lady at the front was friendly , gave me extra red peppers etc.. My bigger pet peeve goes out to dominos customer service I emailed about the issue and their reply was basically sorry stuff happens , we will reach out to the owner. I emailed again offering to show a copy of the receipt and perhaps some sort of reimbursement, I wasn't expecting full.monet back on the pizza.no Rey ever. I tweeted them, no reply. I left a fb message for them, they relied they would look into it but they never emailed back. So I hate to say do the eat at this dominos , it seems u just. They made a silly mistake missing a topping. Some sort of response from corporate to a comsumer more than hey stuff happens would've been appreciated. These stars reflect my overall opinion on dominos.

n7QzMlseY_qRpblD9ax0gg.text: If anyone's wondering the reviews are True. Called in an hour after my order and all he said was to make sure I answer my phone? DONT ORDER FROM HERE

BezzuTvzgtfXKIkYVgPG3g.text: It took an hour and a half From when I placed the order for the order to arrive. Called 3 times trying to find my food. The first being an hour into the order. told it was in its way. No answer the second time no answer. And then told the third call told 8 mins away. The food was cold when it finally arrived. Dissatisfied and disappointed. And nothing done by the store to make amends for their lies or their errors. Avoid this one if you want punctual or warm food.

photos.caption: Photo of Domino's Pizza - Pittsburgh, PA, United States

qTY-l3cGkH3qxnz3Tt7XyA.text: Wow. 2 hours for delivery and the staff doesn't care AT ALL. This was the second time I tried them because last time was during a Steelers game.... but also took 2 hours. When I placed my order it said 20-30 min (I'm 10 min from the store). An hour and a half later I called to cancel. I had to call EIGHT times to get someone to even answer. Then he just said there's nothing they can do it's on the way the driver must be stuck in traffic. (There's no traffic between me and the store). I'm appalled at how absolutely awful this place is. NEVER order from them please!! I wish I could give zero stars. Or talk to someone at the company who cares about customer service. I hope they go out of business soon. Now I see why no one orders Dominos!!!

mssufXAlD7owlZrOiXm71A.text: Ordered on the app, said 27 minutes to delivery. Hour and 20 minutes later and still no delivery. Called the site, they couldn't have cared less. Should have just eaten stale vending machine food. Would have been a more efficient waste of time. The fact this store has half a star over 1 Star is a travesty to all actual 1.5 star restaurants.

ZBa_DNDdu3fML6-8o1tp9g.text: Wow, after giving them the benefit of the doubt I finally called them an hour and 20 minutes after I placed my order.  Instead of a pleasant greeting I was told "You'll be on hold for a few minutes".  I was on hold for 10 minutes before i hung up and called again, this time to cancel my order I was done.  When I called again i got a hello this time but when i said i want to cancel he just asked if my address was right (how did he know before i asked) and just said "ok bye".  There are better Domino's in the area don't go to these people.

xITkkwsbK5OikCXFFTHboA.text: Ordered my pizza at 6:54. It's currently 8:49 and nothing. I've called twice and been assured my food is almost here. This is the worst Domino's location I've ever experienced. I wish I had looked at these other Yelp reviews before ordering.

OoVDJ_kat2TTbr9M73tTHg.text: Worst pizza...even from a national chain. They manipulate the tracker so you cant put in reviews or comments, they dont answer their phone. But worse is i waited 1 hr for cold stale pizza that was flavorless and a waste. Delivery driver was rude and basically threw the pizza at my house mate. Will not reorder ever from this place.

sN8d8pfJ8gh4nj3XcSthPA.text: NEVER ORDER FROM HERE! Ordered from here twice. Both times they said it'd take 30 mins but took significantly longer each time. At least 1 1/2 hours. After that, I stopped paying attention to the clock. Called the store, told me the driver just left and it still took forever. Oh and they forgot a couple things with my order. I could've gone to the grocery store and purchased everything to make a pizza and made enough to feed all the disappointed people who reviewed this Dominos before my pizza would arrive. They just give excuses to customers. There are better Dominos (also better pizza places) to order from. Extremely disappointed.

A4n0B6ZbGYgjg8cGTkHiYw.text: Ordered the pizza at 9:00 online. Everything was going good, but the process was stuck and after refreshing for 2 hours, nothing. We called, and there was no answer. Super poor communication. I would highly avoid ordering here.

photos.caption: Photo of Domino's Pizza - Pittsburgh, PA, United States

1VOOWJ6c8byChrKH5j2Waw.text: Worst Dominos ever.  Order took more than 2 hrs to deliver.  When I called to cancel the manager started abusing me on the phone after saying it is a recorded line.  Good then Dominos corporate can see how their franchisees talk to customers on the phone.  My food was not delivered and the manager said he would still charge my card for pizza that was not delivered. What a Rip Off!!

5l7VkXaXykU0xjnZ_TkOdA.text: Very happy with my pizza and wings. Munara was super polite and prompt. A great late night place to get dinner or a snack! Would order from this location again :)

YaxlE5F0W_87BLRBmWifaQ.text: I wish I could give 0 stars. After the last time I ordered a pizza and it took 1 1/2 hours to deliver after being quoted 30 mins I was miffed. Then I tipped the driver $7 after he thru the pizza at me and was all pissy. Ordered a pizza online at 12:39 was in the oven at 12:41, out for delivery at 1, then I get a call saying it will be another 30 mins. I said your "tracker" said it was delivered and the foreign woman said it's not accurate. I said well maybe you shouldn't have it then. BOTH times they say they're waiting for there driver to get back. Maybe you should hire more drivers. Thank god I pay with cash and don't need my CC refunded bc that would never happen. Side note I live 9 minutes away. I should of just went in to pick it up.

photos.caption: Photo of Domino's Pizza - Pittsburgh, PA, United States. She said the tracker isn&#39;t accurate. So don&#39;t pay attention to it. Really why is it on your site then??!

oPaDXIVPUY2f56FK48_wwg.text: Took close to two hours for delivery.  Multiple phone calls.  Food taste was bad.  pizza was lukewarm.  Overall taste was bad.  Never ordering again!

Zwq47wE89CnCQh_eERKPQA.text: AWEFUL service.  Check the order while the driver is there if you take the chance.  When they mess shit up and you tell them about it they go out of their way to explain how they are right and you are wrong.  AWEFUL. "I'd like to buy this Lamborghini"  Ok here's the keys  "Umm this looks like a Honda Civic?"  No sir that is what u ordered.  "No it's not..  "  Yes sir that is what was ordered   Terrible business practices.

Y2R7Ayk4fDMjTT1odNfeyw.text: Called in tonight to order 3 pizzas, first of all you could barely understand the gentleman taking my order. That didn't bother me too much. What bothered me the most was my entire order was made wrong. Then when I called to confront them about it the dude just wanted to fight about it. Then made me send him pictures of how wrong my pizza was and continued to fight about it with me.  I will never order food from any dominos again! The people working at this dominos obviously have no clue how to take orders and make pizzas. To add to it, they over charged the SH*T out of me! $40 for 3 pizzas that were made wrong!!! Get out!!!  I would NOT recommend ordering from here!

3AgKWwZo5UtnegVUrhkExA.text: The food is always good but I wait over an hour for my food to be delivered every time I order and I live less than 5 minutes away.

Ht1NrdGlqneVkMKHIBwMHg.text: Took them 3 HOURS to get us our pizza. We ordered at 10:30 for the Pens game. The tracker said it was out of the oven at 11. We knew the roads were a little snowy, so we made sure to be patient. At 11:45, it still wasn't in delivery stage, so I called to ask what was going on. It took 2 times to call!! The phone just rang. Then someone just mumbled something into the phone and wouldn't respond. So I called the second time, and that person was the rudest food service employee I've ever dealt with in my life. He said it would be 45 min to an hour. I said fine. Well over an hour later, I gave up and went to bed. My boyfriend stayed up to watch TV. Now it's 1:30, and we get 2 calls from some mystery number (it wasn't the store number) so we didn't answer. Then we hear a knock at the door. My boyfriend answers it, and it's the delivery person. He was rude too! He said "I've been calling you", handed my boyfriend the pizza, and just left. The pizza was luke warm. I should have read the reviews about this place before I ordered. Absolute WORST. We are taking our hard earned money to a restaurant where we are treated respectfully. What a shame.

uOOGq8FiP5qYgbcCpIsXig.text: in the last week I would give them negative stars if I could. Went in to pick up my carryout pizza, I was the only customer and it still took 5 minutes to get waited on. Noone was busy, all the workers kept looking at me but wouldn't assist. Once I got home my wife and I were stunned to see the pizza had a massive hole in it about the size of a baseball. Upon further inspection we found out half of the dough wasn't under the cheese, just cardboard. Also the entire pizza wasn't fully cooked. I called and told them and they told me they would credit my account and hung up on me . Funny thing is I paid in cash you can't credit my account. I would go back and make them give me my money back but I stopped on the way to get baby food and get back to my pregnant wife it was a one way trip. Worst food I've ever ordered from a food chain. Take my advice and do not waste your money at that location

q2g5-WZHXCTVxw1WDvYOAw.text: I live less then 5 minutes away and the delivery always takes over an hour. When I call to ask where my food is they say it's on the way and I still wait another 15 mins. Food is ok but not deserving of anything higher then 1 star.
